portfolio

I’ve put some of my past projects into longer form stories so you can get a better sense of the evolution of the designs:

  fireeye Bigger Needles, Smaller Haystacks
  apple Helping Those Who Help Others
  super q (personal project) Strategies For A Better Leisure Time
  ericsson Never Too Old To Learn New Tricks
  greentable (school project) Vegetarians Can Be Foodies Too
  walmart.com Shopping On The Down Low

There is more work that is not in a story format below. If nothing on this page fits your interests, reach out to me and let me know as I have other work tabled as well I can share offline.

I helped the Product team establish the Fiori experience for the key worldwide launch.
I worked with the CEO on building Lifograph’s business networking product from the ground up for it’s initial launch to the marketplace.
Working with the Trust Services team, I helped implement new features for SMB customers purchasing new certificates for their online properties.
With a background in the life sciences, I worked through a medical diagnostic product. This product can track video and be as good as a professional full filter camera.
This was a quick turnaround project for MoneyLion and was done as part of an initiation process.
I consulted the Product team in translating a decade old onboarding experience into a fluid and responsive online application.

Thanks for visiting! If you want to comment on anything or work together, I would love to hear from you!
